targets.query: from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="cpu_temp_c") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="load1") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

u_s = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="uptime_s")
  |> last()

u_d = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="uptime_dhms")
  |> last()

alive = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="heartbeat" and r._field=="alive")
  |> last()

row_ud = u_d
  |> keep(columns:["_value"]) 
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ metric: "Uptime (dhms)", value: string(v: r._value) }))

row_us = u_s
  |> keep(columns:["_value"]) 
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ metric: "Uptime (s)", value: string(v: r._value) }))

row_on = alive
  |> keep(columns:["_value"]) 
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ metric: "Online", value: if bool(v: r._value) then "Yes" else "No" }))

row_seen = alive
  |> keep(columns:["_time"]) 
  |> map(fn:(r)=> ({ metric: "Last seen", value: string(v: r._time) }))

union(tables:[row_ud, row_us, row_on, row_seen])
  |> keep(columns:["metric","value"])

t1 = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="cpu_temp_c")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

t2 = from(bucket: v.bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="sys" and r._field=="load1")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

union(tables: [t1, t2])

from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="gpio" and r._field=="IO0") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="gpio" and r._field=="IO1") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="gpio" and r._field=="IO2") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)

from(bucket: v.bucket) |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop) |> filter(fn:(r)=> r.group=="gpio" and r._field=="IO3") |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
